name: ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Gabion Basket
template name: ITP - E1401A - Captain's Culvert Inlet Remediation - Gabion Basket

name: Detail - Set out the base of the Gabion basket
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Markout
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Zinc aluminium, plastic coating mesh size, selvedge wire Stainless steel rings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Ensure delivery docket matches materials delivered
Conformance Criteria - Any defective baskets are NOT to be used in the wall construction - return to the supplier immediately
Detail - Rock Infill shall be 100mm minimum and 250mm maximum particle size based diameter
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Ensure delivery docket matches materials delivered
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements noted on bulk fill checksheet
Detail - Excavate footprint of the wall area to the correct line and level and ensure area safe to work in.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Base of excavation to be checked by Geotech engineer / CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Confirmation from the Engineer
Detail - Clegg Test the base of the excavation after placing 250mm AP65.
Frequency - Prior to construction of wall
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Confirmation from the Engineer
Detail - Subsoil drainage is required for this wall construction then follow the ITP for Subsoil Drainage
Frequency - Prior to construction of wall
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Erect the first level of baskets as per Manufacturers specs along the front face of layers to ensure correct line and level.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Tie the first layer of baskets together using Manufacturers specs for tying baskets
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Place Gabion material into baskets ensuring the outside facing the flat side of the bigger stones are placed by hand to ensure that the baskets are kept square
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Tip Gabion material slowly into the baskets to fill the voids as much as possible
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Ensure line and level of front face is as per design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Tie next layers of bottom to the top of the previous layer to ensure that they wont move when rocks are placed inside & complete the basket filling process again
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
